sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Ad fraternam communionem inter evangelicas ecclesias restaurandam adhortatio in eo fundata, quòd non dissentiant in ullo fundamentali catholicæ fidei articulo. Per Reverendum in Christo patrem, Johann. Davenantium Episcopum Sarisburiensem. Davenant, John, ca. 1572-1641.
[4], 164 p.
Ex officina Rogeri Danielis almæ Academiæ typographi, Cantabrigiæ : M D XL. [1640]
Includes a reprint of Davenant's contribution to: De pace inter evangelicos procuranda sententiae quatuor. The roman numeral date is made with turned C's. Running title reads: D. Davenantii ad pacem eccl. adhortatio. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
=======

[4], 164 p.
Ex officina Rogeri Danielis almæ Academiæ typographi, Cantabrigiæ : M D XL. [1640]
Includes a reprint of Davenant's contribution to: De pace inter evangelicos procuranda sententiae quatuor. The roman numeral date is made with turned C's. Running title reads: D. Davenantii ad pacem eccl. adhortatio. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
